title: Microsoft SQL Server Vulnerability Allows Privilege Escalation

content.raw: Microsoft has disclosed a critical SQL injection vulnerability in SQL Server that could allow authenticated attackers to escalate their privileges over a network. Tracked as CVE-2025-59499 and assigned an Important severity rating, the vulnerability stems from improper neutralization of special elements in SQL commands, exposing enterprise databases to potential unauthorized administrative access. The vulnerability, disclosed […] The post Microsoft SQL Server Vulnerability Allows Privilege Escalation appeared first on GBHackers Security | #1 Globally Trusted Cyber Security News Platform.
